## Baixar ou atualizar material

```
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("curso-r/CursoR")

CursoR::atualizar_material()
```

## Slides

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::kable(
  tibble::tibble(
    slide = CursoR:::list_github_files("dashboard-mestre", "slides/", "html"),
    link = paste0("https://curso-r.github.io/dashboard-mestre/", slide)
  )
)
```

## Scripts com exemplos mostrados em aula

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::kable(
  tibble::tibble(
    script = list.files("exemplos/", pattern = ".R"),
    link = paste0("https://curso-r.github.io/dashboard-mestre/exemplos/", script)
  )
)
```
